Name: Spring Revival
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Originally based on Bacardí Carta Blanca, this was the Lithuanian Bacardí Legacy 2014 winning cocktail . Created by Algirdas Mulevicius at Mr Bond bar in Klaipeda, Lithuania.
